title: Black Riders Hide Test Gildor Inglorion

comments.content: I am finally playing Black Riders, campaign mode.  In the Quest Phase staging, the encounter card revealed was "Crawling Towards Him".  It has: "Peril.  Hide 2."  The active location is "Woody End", so my test is actually "Hide 1."  I committed Sam Gangee (3 quest points) to the hide test. The card revealed from the encounter deck for the hide test is the objective-ally Gildor Inglorion.  What happens?
He has no threat (like a treachery), so you would pass the hide test.  You don't resolve "when revealed" effects during a hide test, so Gildor gets discarded.
Teamjimby -- thank you very much for your answer!  Now I can get back to my game and know I am playing correctly!
